sentences.en: After the die, it takes some time for polymer molecules to get reoriented to a random manner again, and to recrystallize.
sentences.cn: 经过模具之后，聚合物分子需要一定的时间进行重新定型回复到随机方向，并再次结晶。

sentences.en: Coarse crystalline LC4 Aluminium Alloy presents certain superplasticity at lower deformation temperature and higher strain rate because it can create effective recrystallize refinement.
sentences.cn: 粗晶LC4 合金在较低温度和较高应变速率条件下，因能产生有效的再结晶细化而呈现出一定的超塑性。

sentences.en: It begins to recrystallize at the temperature of 800℃or so, and then, its high temperature mechanics performance decrease.
sentences.cn: 但是，纯钼的再结晶温度较低，在800℃左右就开始再结晶，其高温力学性能下降。

sentences.en: It will recrystallize into the original structure.
sentences.cn: 它将重新结晶为原来的结构.

trans.tran_en: to dissolve and subsequently crystallize (a substance) from the solution, as in purifying chemical compounds, or (of a substance) to crystallize in this way
